answers.answer: No you cant get hiv  from the activities you describe!Dont complicate yourselves.leave this behind and move on with your life.Good luck and all the best!!!!

question: Hi Doc, yesterday I go to clinic and check my diabetes level.1.the doc use lancet to prick my blood I did not notice he got or not change the lancet if other people got hiv use it before me can I get hiv?2.the doc take  my hand with blood to check it on a meter .I dunno the meter is clean or not and my hand with blood touch the machine meter can I get hiv?I am worry.thank you.
title: very worry.pls help
